pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:0.5: Ime kho panāyyāyo sattarasa saṃghādisesā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako bhikkhunisaṃghassa udositaṃ datvā kālaṅkato hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.4: eko assaddho appasanno, eko saddho pasanno.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.6: Atha kho so assaddho appasanno taṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.8: Evaṃ vutte, so saddho pasanno taṃ assaddhaṃ appasannaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.11: Dutiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno taṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.13: Atha kho so saddho pasanno taṃ assaddhaṃ appasannaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.16: Tatiyampi kho so assaddho appasanno taṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.22: Atha kho so udosito tehi bhājīyamāno tassa assaddhassa appasannassa pāpuṇāti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.23: Atha kho so assaddho appasanno bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.25: Evaṃ vutte thullanandā bhikkhunī taṃ purisaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.26: “māyyo, evaṃ avaca, tumhākaṃ pitunā bhikkhunisaṃghassa dinno”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.30: Evaṃ vutte, thullanandā bhikkhunī te mahāmatte etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.31: “api nāyyā tumhehi diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā sakkhiṃ ṭhapayitvā dānaṃ diyyamānan”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.33: “saccaṃ kho ayyā āhā”ti taṃ udositaṃ bhikkhunisaṃghassa akaṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.34: Atha kho so puriso parājito ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.39: Atha kho so puriso daṇḍito bhikkhunupassayassa avidūre ājīvakaseyyaṃ kārāpetvā ājīvake uyyojesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.44: “paṭhamaṃ bhikkhuniyo udositaṃ acchindāpesuṃ, dutiyaṃ daṇḍāpesuṃ, tatiyaṃ bandhāpesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.46: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.47: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.49: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.50: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.53: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā viharissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.55: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:1.56: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā dāsena vā kammakārena vā antamaso samaṇaparibbājakenāpi, ayaṃ bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.16: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca sikkhamānañca sāmaṇerañca sāmaṇeriñca ṭhapetvā yo koci paribbājakasamāpanno.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.17: Aḍḍaṃ karissāmīti dutiyaṃ vā pariyesati gacchati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.26: saṃghova tassā āpattiyā mānattaṃ deti mūlāya paṭikassati abbheti, na sambahulā na ekā bhikkhunī. Tena vuccati “saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss1:2.1.27: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenapi vuccati “saṃghādiseso”ti.
